Description: Postcard; printed paper; photograph showing the Monument to Muhammad Ali Pasha at Alexandria.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally unused. See EPH-ME 2918; acquired with EPH-ME 2919-2925 which are part of the same set, in the same condition and although not postally used probably originated from the same collection.
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Place Mehemet Aly
